Data: Air Safe Hitch 1-701-277-0510 Free shipping on all orders in the continental U.S., no minimum required Register Testimonials Contact Login Cart: Your cart is empty Toggle Navigation Receiver Hitches Receiver Accessories 5th Wheel Hitches Goosenecks Reduce driver fatigue Less wear and tear on truck and trailer Improve the quality of the ride Protect your precious cargo Free-floating airbag between truck and trailer, no pivoting points Non-hinged design allows for better performance and superior shock absorption Air Hitch Technology Air Hitch Technology has been a manufacturer of air ride hitches for over 20 years, offering tow products that eliminate jerking, bouncing, and chucking for all types of towing styles. With air ride technology for all hitch types, we make products for distribution in North America, Australia, and Europe by taking all the shock out of towing. Receiver Hitches Receiver Accessories 5th Wheel Hitches Goosenecks We Trade, Resell, and Refurbish Existing Hitches Air Hitch Technology offers several options for existing customers. We have a refurbished options from simple inspecting services to stripping down and replacing all the wear parts on the hitch. Want to trade? We have you covered. We value all products in the field and have fixed trade in values for your hitch regardless of age or condition. If the hitch still functions you can trade it in for a new product. For those customers who are done towing we offer a resell option as well. Send us your hitch, we will inspect it and offer it to those customers who are in the market for a used product. Also we do not share customer information with any other third party. Shipment Sales tax: tax applies to MN customers only unless MN customer provides Air Hitch Technology with a valid and correct tax exemption certificate applicable to the product ship-to location prior to Air Hitch Technology’s acceptance of the order. If you place an order before 3 PM ET, it is most likely that the product will be shipped the next day pending the product is in stock. For special/unique orders, we may need to assemble the products first, and this requires a minimum of 24 hours to ensure there is no issue with the airbag holding air. For special/emergency orders we will do our best to get the hitch out as soon as possible. Orders placed during the weekends or holidays are shipped the next business day, pending product is in stock. We are not responsible for severe weather delays at origin or destination of any item sold. All shipments are based on business day travel not including Saturday or Sunday (with the exception of Saturday delivery). We do not ship to PO boxes. We ship UPS ground, unless customer has asked for an expedited delivery. For orders requiring an LTL delivery, it is the customer’s responsibility to have a means of removing the pallet from the truck if no liftgate service is requested. Air Hitch Technology is not responsible for shipments delayed/returned if the customer was not able to accept delivery. Since using these Class VI Air Safe hitches, we have seen a tremendous difference in the over-the-road damage to our trailers—no more cracked tongues, less tire damage, and overall less wear and tear on the tow vehicle. We just don’t have the damage we used to.”– Steve Mattfeldt, Sun Valley Rides“This hitch is worth every penny. It made an unbelievable difference in the ride quality, especially over uneven concrete slab roads.”– Scott Reberg, Copperas Cove, TX“This thing is amazing. It has substantially reduced the problem I was having with kitchen items bouncing. The ride in the pickup is so much better, it is great. Thank you.”– Wes Schumann“Let me tell you the hitch made a HUGE difference in our travels. I noticed the difference just pulling out of the driveway. Very satisfied.”– Thad Powell“To say I love my Airsafe gooseneck hitch would be an understatement. I pull a 40' Big Tex Trailer with a 3500 Ram dually. Before I added the hitch, the ride was terrible. As soon as it was installed, the difference was immediate. I almost couldn’t believe it. I pull 15–25k pounds, and it rides so much better. I know it will save wear and tear on my truck. Thank you.”– Randall Pennington Information About Us Shipping Information Privacy Policy Terms & Conditions Follow Us Follow us on Facebook Follow us on Instagram Contact Us Air Safe Hitch 2811 Fiechtner Dr. Fargo, ND 58103 Tel: (701) 277-0510 © 2023 Air Hitch by AirSafe Hitch Technologies

Air Safe Hitch - Receiver Hitches 1-701-277-0510 Free shipping on all orders in the continental U.S., no minimum required Register Testimonials Contact Login Cart: Your cart is empty Toggle Navigation Receiver Hitches Receiver Accessories 5th Wheel Hitches Goosenecks Home Receiver Hitches Receiver Hitches THE AIRSAFE™ RECEIVERS Reduces trailer and content fatigue Reduces driver fatigue Increases tire and transmission life Saves Gas since you are moving forward not up and down Increases the life of the electronics found throughout your truck and trailer Increase your ride quality Improves overall safety Increases your quality of life, you deserve an AIRSAFE™ hitch With AIRSAFE™ you stop the flow of shock flow between the tow vehicle to the trailer and greatly reduce the explosion of energy when these two forces meet. The patented AIRSAFE™ hitches are engineered so the connection to the trailer is separated from the connection to the tow vehicle by an industrial-strength airbag. The air bags sit between the steel shank plate and the steel ball mount plate which glides on high-strength, self-lubricating Nyloil. The two plates are connected by four high-strength (16,200 lb. tow rated) steel tie-rods . We then bring it all together with a two-year warranty making the world’s finest engineered and most technically advanced AIRSAFE™ Receiver line. Innovation and engineering insures you receive the safest and smoothest ride. “Enjoy the ride, arrive alive.” With AIRSAFE™ you stop the flow of shock flow between the tow vehicle to the trailer and greatly reduce the explosion of energy when these two forces meet. The patented AIRSAFE™ hitches are engineered so the connection to the trailer is separated from the connection to the tow vehicle by an industrial strength airbag. Reduces trailer and content fatigue. Reduces driver fatigue. Eliminates most all surging, bucking, chucking. Increases tire and transmission life. Saves Gas since you are moving forward not up and down Increases the life of the electronics found throughout your truck and trailer. Increase your ride quality. Improves overall safety. Air Safe Hitch - Goosenecks 1-701-277-0510 Free shipping on all orders in the continental U.S., no minimum required Register Testimonials Contact Login Cart: Your cart is empty Toggle Navigation Receiver Hitches Receiver Accessories 5th Wheel Hitches Goosenecks Home Goosenecks Goosenecks AIRSAFE™ air hitch goosenecks are engineered with you and your precious cargo’s comfort and safety in mind. Our exclusive patented design protects cargo from injury by nearly eliminating shock transferred from the vehicle to the trailer. Veterinarian approved—your animals will love you. Our goosenecks are construction industry tough, and they prevent vehicle damage, driver fatique, and increase your gas mileage; what a great way to save your hard earned money. Air Safe Hitch 1-701-277-0510 Free shipping on all orders in the continental U.S., no minimum required Register Testimonials Contact Login Cart: Your cart is empty Toggle Navigation Receiver Hitches Receiver Accessories 5th Wheel Hitches Goosenecks Home ABOUT US About Us Air Safe was developed in the late 1990s for the RV market. Air Safe was created to improve the quality of the ride for the driver and what was being towed. Air Safe is one of those products that you simply need to try to believe how much of a difference it makes when towing a trailer. Air Safe isolates and removes the majority of shock and stress between the tow vehicle and the trailer. Whether you tow large heavy loads, campers, or even small utility trailers we have a solution that will fit. The Air Safe product helps when you have a heavy trailer and lighter truck or heavy truck and light trailer.
